item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Miso Japanese Restaurant

Miso has, in my humble opinion, the best sushi and Japanese food in the area. And apparently I'm not the only one who thinks so, Miso is winner of "Best Sushi in Connecticut 2008" by Connecticut Magazine!

Specials for The Collective will be free samples of their award-winning sushi and Japanese dishes.

Contact is Ed: (203) 583-9668

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Miso Japanese Restaurant Happy Hour!
